name: Bandai Slayer Demon ´s Resolution The Third ichiban figure
description:
The BANDAI Demon Slayer´s Resolution The Third ichiban figures are a must-have for any fan of the popular anime and manga series.

The figures are beautifully designed and feature intricate detailing that truly brings the characters to life.

Each figure is painted in vibrant, eye-catching colors, making them stand out in any collection.

The fan zone is sure to be thrilled with these figures, as they capture the essence of the beloved characters from Demon Slayer.

Whether you´re a fan of Tanjiro, Nezuko, or any of the other iconic characters from the series, you´re sure to find a figure that you love.

These figures are perfect for displaying in your home or office, adding a touch of anime flair to any space.

Whether you´re a longtime fan of Demon Slayer or are just discovering the series, these ichiban figures are a fantastic addition to your collection.

Don´t miss out on the opportunity to own these stunning and collectible figures! Ichiban Kuji is a Japanese tombola or lottery held in shops where you have to buy a ticket to participate.

When you tear the ticket you will get a letter that corresponds to one of the prizes.

We are offering the full set of prizes without the need for lotteries or tickets.
